data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: A wild invite modal has appeared
data.expected_result: You get back to Discord normally
data.short_description: If you create a server on Android while the Desktop client is minimized to system tray, the invite screen will pop up upon reopening the Desktop client
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch Discord on Desktop and minimize to system tray - Create a server on Android - Dismiss the initial invite screen on Android (to ensure it's not caused by that) - Close Android and Reopen Desktop
